website_summaries.verdict: A well-priced kit that offers both variety and quality.
pros: Includes durable, high-quality tools that you wouldn’t expect at this price point
Kit offers a good mix of stick-on 3D nail art and stencils that allow you to create your own designs
Items come well packaged and feel durable
A wide variety of colored gems, glitters, foils, and decals to choose from
cons: The kit offers no guidelines or instructions, making some items confusing to use

customer_reviews.title: Great set for pretty DIY winter/Christmas nails
customer_reviews.text: Great starter set for doing your own decorative nails - Christmas and winter themed decals make for cute holiday touch - lots of choices and product in the set - 3 containers of colored beads, gold accent pieces, and various rhinestones (set of red, white, and blue) - foil strips and small sheets allow for other fun designs - plus 3 fine ti brushes for artwork, tiny tipped tweezers to grab the small jewels, and small scissors. Just add your own polish and creativity! Love it!! No instructions (some of the decals need water to pull them off the paper - watch the video on the site - easy to do!) but TONS of stuff for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nolzgirl99

customer_reviews.title: Good kit! Lots to work with.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of amazing tools and nail decorations. The tools seem very high quality as do the decorations but the reason I didn't give full 5 stars, is that it didn't come with any guide to use or instructions. I have never used products like these before so I'm learning slowly via YouTube, which is fine, but I would rather read directions and get started right away. Besides that, great nail kit!
customer_reviews.author: Milinda

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price and then some
customer_reviews.text: Not Mark - this is his wife, Eve.. LoL This is an amazing product.. It has so many things so that I can do designs on my nails. Messing with my nails is one of my hobbies and this is one of the things I needed. I love the gems, the brushes, and everything they included in the packages. I included pics of everything that came in the order and one of the simple design I did on my nail.
customer_reviews.author: Mstrong

customer_reviews.title: Huge value
customer_reviews.text: This kit is an excellent value for the price. The water decals are in the cutest Christmas designs, from classic to whimsical. Every color of the rainbow including holographic colors of striping tapes, every shape imaginable from drips, classic french smiles and moon manicure guide stickers. The foils are beautiful. The implements are very nice quality. The best part in my opinion are the boxes of jewels. They're fully packed and sparkle beautifully. Each container has an extensive assortment of caviar beads, metal bits and bright sparkling pointy back crystals with the right mix to be able to match your accent nails on each hand. Overall this set is an EXCELLENT value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy but..
customer_reviews.text: Over all I am happy with the kit. Even though I'll have to wait til Christmas time in order to use the water decals, the price is good for what you get. Brushes are good quality and love the tip guides. The only reason I give it 3 stars is because the stripping tape is hard to use without one of those handy dispensers thingys. And the biggest let down was most of the gems aren't flat back. Though pretty, trying to attach it to a nail with regular polish is impossible! (Unless you want to use half a tube of glue)
customer_reviews.author: J Smith

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need to create gorgeous natural looking nails!
customer_reviews.text: This product is fun! I love doing my nails and really enjoyed just how many great pieces came in the kit! The brushes come in a variety of sizes, perfect for applying small nail art or doing a touch up. The stickers are easy to apply and with a clear coat of gel, stay on for quite a while. The scissors are perfect for cutting the stickers for placement, but also the right size for trimming and applying wraps to correct a broken nail. What a helpful and exciting little bag of goodies for the nail enthusiast!
customer_reviews.author: SCB

customer_reviews.title: A lot of tools for different looks
customer_reviews.text: I am falling in love with this nail kit! Still working on getting better with usin the brushes to make designs, but the stencils are simple to use and make adorable patterns! The gems add a bit of sparkle as well and the different tapes make it easy to add designs or stripes with no mess! Look forward to doing mine and my daughters nails from home instead of paying others to do our nails.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: These are going to get so much use!
customer_reviews.text: A great assortment of brushes and other fun stuff!! Some of the rhinestones are really big, and many are not flat backed.... but they were just a bonus anyway... I was really after the brushes.... My son is wanting to start painting D&D miniatures, and these brushes will be great for that too.... I have not yet put them in acetone, but as paintbrushes, they are nice... there are a couple that I e the silicone tops, those are great for building and sculpting the acrylic.
customer_reviews.author: Evonne Burris

customer_reviews.title: nice but not exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I failed to notice that the dotting pens are all the same size, and also the one stencil I wanted the most that was pictured in the item is not included in the collection of stencils I got. So just be aware that you might get random stencils not pictured here. I like the decals, but also note that they are often just one alone without a matching decal so your finger decals will not be perfectly symmetrical. The brushes have worked well so far and seem good quality (although I really am no expert on this matter). The scissors and the tweezers are both very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: glue it correctly
customer_reviews.text: this small but awesome product has everything you want as a beginner in nail designs. I loved the stones. BIG ADVISE: GLUE THEM CORRECTLY! Some of the gold 3D nail art is too sturdy and wont ben, also some are too sharp and if you do not use the proper glue, you will definitely pull it out. ***Specially when you're taking a shower***
customer_reviews.author: LaYellz

customer_reviews.title: Shopping on my husbands acct
customer_reviews.text: A great buy for my very first nail art kit! Loved all the tools, and gems, and stickers are neat I am thankful I watched videos on how to use the stickers because it made it easier to use! (Sorry I am new to all this nail art) so soaking in water helps sticker and paper to separate! Also the sticker collection that comes with it! Was ok I would of preferred more if a variety and it stinks because you don’t know what stickers you are getting! So now got a bunch of stickers that I don’t use! But anyways it’s a great buy for newbie nail Beginners like myself!
customer_reviews.author: Angel n Kaho

customer_reviews.title: Not the best kit out there!
customer_reviews.text: There are some good things about this kit such as the variety of brushes and the tweezers. However, the scissors will not cut, the dotting tools are all the same size, and the nail stickers are all of a Native American theme. Look around for a better kit!
customer_reviews.author: tiger17

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: So so soooo happy with this set! I do my own nails fairly frequently, and there is such a large variety in the set to make so many different designs. The brush set is my absolute favorite part of the package. The variety makes paining almost any design easy!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Zuccaro

customer_reviews.title: Great nail kit!
customer_reviews.text: First, let me say I was hesitant when looking at the description of everything included. The kit held true to its description. Absolutely worth the price, and is a great deal The items in the kit were amazing! Bright colors and so many options! We haven’t been able to try everything in this kit but what we have used I’ve been impressed with. The decals and stickers held up great and the tools in the kit were very sturdy. My daughters also had a blast using the kit. Will buy again when I run out!
customer_reviews.author: Tbird797

customer_reviews.title: IT'S ok
customer_reviews.text: Duhhh, my nails!!! I disliked there was no thing to pick up crystals for nails, n it could use 1 nailstamping plate. Overall it is a ok lol kit. Love the sharp scissors. Good for the SUPER THIN PIECES OF LIL FOIL LIKE STRIPS
customer_reviews.author: WINTER BABY

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing kit!! If I could give it a billion stars, I would. I’m soooo excited to use it. It looks like it is great quality and there is so much quantity wise. I’m very please. I’ve already recommended it to someone who is going to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Martz

customer_reviews.title: Great variety, awesome value!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome value! I haven’t seen a better variety of tools and embellishments for at home manicures. I recently got in to doing dip nails and this kit will be awesome to do more customized nail designs.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor and BUY!
customer_reviews.text: When you go to nail school to become certified , you get a kit that comes with everything you need. This kit rivals that one- especially for the price! The brushes are sturdy and don’t fray to pieces. The silicone tipped tools are perfect for gel sculpting and engraved designs! The charms were a lovely touch to everything else in the bag, but the brushes truly surpassed my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: everything you need to make the most amazing nails!
customer_reviews.text: This set comes with things i didn't even know i could use to make my nails fabulous. you get stones and tape and every brush and tools you could every use. This makes it so much easier and faster to do your nails when you have all the right tools. this is great fro beginners too
customer_reviews.author: IceQx13

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: Sure a fun little surprise kit!! I love it. Used one of the brushes, a sponge and 2 different foils and they are really awesome! It’s a very good little surprise for when you want accent nails. HIGHLY suggest, especially if you are looking for something with new material to use and especially foils. Enjoyed throughly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Some of the colors were spilled when I received it and not all of the studs were as pictured. When I let the company know they sent me out a new kit immediately. Other than those small things I love it. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle wiens-baley

customer_reviews.title: rip off
customer_reviews.text: We did not receive at least 1/2 of what was advertised. Contact was attempted but have not heard anything. Very disappointed as it was a gift for my child.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Exinia

customer_reviews.title: Professional looking with less effort and cost!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this kit! It has everything you need down to tweezers that actually work to help you be more precise with your nail designs. The stencils are amazing, the silver/gold/black strips make it so easy to make something that looks like it took hours. Everything is just great! 😍 p.s. I hand wash dishes a ton and my nails still look great! 😘
customer_reviews.author: barbarakeim

customer_reviews.title: Highly impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these nail art tool you get so much for the price and there good quality items. Have done my nails three times with this set and can't wait till my neice is old enough do I can do hers. Product is great for beginners or someone that does there nails often like me . Already recommend to my sister in-law
customer_reviews.author: Paula Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Happy I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This nail kit is a great purchase. I've never seen a nail kit have so many things included in it! I love the nail tattoos. There are so many things you can do with this kit. It would be great for a beginner or even as a gift. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Was pretty awesome! Got here quick. Only thing i wish was it came with instructions for the decals had to ask my mom how to use them. Had no idea i was supposed to get them wet to get them off the paper. Maybe instructions should be included for those who dont normally do nails. But overall i loved everything amd it arrived quick
customer_reviews.author: Sabryna

customer_reviews.title: I am SHOOK
customer_reviews.text: I knew this was a good deal for the amount of products you get; but I didn’t know how legit and great quality it all was going to be. I actually had happy anxiety as I was going through the products. You get more for the little amount you pay for. 100% SATISFIED CUSTOMER!!
customer_reviews.author: Rose Kesh

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Seems like great products. Definitely doesn’t seem cheap and will last. Well at least from me since I’m learning.
customer_reviews.author: LeAlyce Brisco

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved this set! It has everything you need - lots of different pens, fun nail art rhinestones and the striping looks really cool! This is a great set if you’re a beginner or more experienced! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: More bang for your buck!!! Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome!! For $19 it’s insane how much you get!! All the nail art and nail tools are amazing quality. I’ve been nonstop doin nails since I got this!! If your looking for a nail art kit this is definitely the way to go!!
customer_reviews.author: Star Winkleman

customer_reviews.title: These brushes are the bomb. Com you better watch out or you'll be gone.
customer_reviews.text: these are the most amazing brushes I've ever used and I will definitely be buying them again I recommend them for everyone and I definitely have never seen nothing like this ever it all are wonderful it's hard to choose you have to choose what you use
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Brouard

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun kit! This will keep me and my girls happy for a long time! There are so many fun options to be able to design different things on our nails. Tools are great and the assortment is wonderful! Very happy with this choice!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Jones

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It’s an ok assortment of items. The crystals are ok. Some of them look very cheap. The glitter is very fine and doesn’t show up well. The shimmer powder doesn’t work well at all and that’s the reason I bought this. At least it was cheap. You get what you pay for I guess. It’s a lot of product for the money at least.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Cute set! I’m in awe of all the art brushes that come in this pack. I wasn’t expecting all that I got. The designs were neat although, my only downside was they were all one theme. I wish there were different designs to play with. But the brushes are great which is why I bought it...so I’m happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loads of good crap!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything I needed. It has several things that I didn’t notice and it’s great. The stencils worked surprisingly well. This is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: A must have for you girl and women
customer_reviews.text: I gotta say this is really worth the money not only can you design ur nails. It has so many to choose from. I love it. Now u can have salon nails and toes at home. A must have if you love to pamper yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Lady bug

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: so much fun contained in one bag. My 4 year old loves it when I use them on her. Of course it’s difficult to place the metal pieces on her nails, they don’t stick. However, the stickers do. They last couple days with regular nail polish. The design pencil work great. We’ve had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: M. De La Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Great nail art kit!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best nail kit I've ever used. I had a girls night and brought it out. Everyone was super impressed with the items included and how good the quality of the products were. They all left very impressed. I gave them all the link.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: comes with a ton of tools for a great deal. Quality is as expected and is great for a beginner nail artist like me. Mainly have used to clean up excess gel between curings but plan on experimenting more.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great value and multipurpose
customer_reviews.text: I got these for the tools to use for my clay working rather than nail polish and gave the stickers and tape to a friend and the tools are great!!! So much for your money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brooklynn Renee White

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything is exactly as in the photos! Lots of options! However I did think that there would be more jewels.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Brison

customer_reviews.title: DIY nails
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner at DIY nails, so I was looking for something that would help with applying chrome powders, creating designs, and applying gel polish. This set is perfect for any beginner. I have been able to do several designs using the dotting tools and the striping tapes. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Caglin

customer_reviews.title: Colorful nail art kit
customer_reviews.text: This nail kit has so many fun nail decals, foils, and jewels. It also comes with all of the tools needed to apply these colorful accessories. It’s definitely a good value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jade D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, no instructions except online
customer_reviews.text: Nail art tools came as expected. Really nice set, but no instructions so I recommend you save the screen shots from the site when you buy the set if you're new at this. My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Lots of tools to design and create on my nails. Very good quality with lots more than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: MY

customer_reviews.title: The best nail kit ive seen
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed with everything in this kit! All the different brushes and rhinestones and designs! This kit is loaded with everything you want! Everything is packaged in a pouch so I can't loose anything! Can't wait to show my nail tech
customer_reviews.author: Deborah & Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful kit full of lots of super cute decals, bejeweled bits, and all the tools needed to do beautiful trendy manicures. My three daughters are infatuated with the kit and are asking me for new manicures every day!
customer_reviews.author: dubplateprincess

customer_reviews.title: Great set,  worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this set, gorgeous jewels, stickers and tapes. Tweezers and scissors and a cute carry case.... the perfect set to make my nails gorgeous
customer_reviews.author: Stacyb327

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a Christmas gift and was surprised how great these are! I put them in a gift bag to disguise the packaging and she absolutely loved these
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Brown

customer_reviews.title: A huge variety of embellishments and tools
customer_reviews.text: This set comes with a huge variety of nail embellishments. My personal favorite being the rhinestones. The tools are super helpful too for painting and creating fun designs. Great price too
customer_reviews.author: Amber Poff

customer_reviews.title: Wow...just wow
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised at just how much was included, even though that was clearly stated before I ordered, just mind blowing the amount included. Haven’t had a chance to use everything yet but what I have used has worked great. Shipped super quick as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bree Sams

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the amount!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the tools/brushes not even realizing that it came with a bunch of other stuff!!! I love the water decals and the tools!
customer_reviews.author: Jon  Mortonstout

customer_reviews.title: Amazing kit
customer_reviews.text: This set is amazing! I've never been able to do so much with my nails and so many designs until i got it. I love it and anyone who loves doing their nails should buy this kit! It's totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Tralena Speidel

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: love this product , i am very pleased . fast delivery .
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need
customer_reviews.text: I'm so excited for this it has everything you could possibly need to do your nails at home so many different designs to create the sky is the limit this will bring me hours and years of enjoyment so happy with these nail art tools
customer_reviews.author: Renee Nicole

customer_reviews.title: So much for your money! See photos.
customer_reviews.text: High quality brushes, silicone and nail art or nail acrylic/gel application. Decals are different from anything I’ve seen pretty cool. The nail tapes are awesome thin and thick and the rhinestones are amazing quality.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this nail kit. I been looking for a reasonable price for a nail kit that comes with allot of decals. There are lots of different styles and ways you can decorate your nails. The scissors, and tweezers works great. Highly recommend. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: No directions in package
customer_reviews.text: They work really well once I got use to them
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Belcher

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with directions so that not great but love the packing and items I would give 5 star if it came with instructions on how to use everything
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: A great little kit! Everything came wrapped neatly and individually within the package, and it is really good quality. The water decals are really cute and it came with so much stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda B

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: This kit has everything you need to beautify your nails! I can't believe all the things you get for under $20!! It also comes with sponges and stamps for your nail and little gems to bling them.
customer_reviews.author: Mello

customer_reviews.title: Taking my nail art to the next level.
customer_reviews.text: The brushes are sturdy and should keep shape for a while. The scrapper worked phenomenally. The ombre brush, dotting tools, and cuticle nippers are great as well. The gems are cute little details I can't wait to use them on a set.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tool set. Not only for nail but also other small crafts.
customer_reviews.author: mengyzhang

customer_reviews.title: Best Nail Kit Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product and all the choices! Easy to use! My daughters also loves the kit and the how many choices we had. Also, for the price you really get a lot for your money. Will buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Use at home love it
customer_reviews.text: Works fine so far had everything I needed in this pack and more thank you
customer_reviews.author: heidi

customer_reviews.title: Fun beginner set. Needs Directions
customer_reviews.text: Just learning nail art, and this is a great set to start off with.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun nail art stuff
customer_reviews.text: This bag came PACKED with goodies. I haven't had a chance to use much of them yet, but it all came as shown.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Lowder

customer_reviews.title: Super Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I can't believe that for just under $20 I was able to get so many things. I used it and everything works great. When and if the time comes to restock and the same item is available, I will be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Robubz

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the money
customer_reviews.text: Loved the foil but the rhinestone are not flat so too hard to apply. The strips are cute but i can’t figure out how to make them stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Meek

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so excited with this kit! I was surprised at just how much was included! It has lots of super cute decals, bejeweled bits, and all the tools needed to do beautiful manicures. It will bring me hours of creative enjoyment. It is totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: S. Blanks

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Product
customer_reviews.text: Brushes messed up first time I used them and tape didn’t stick
customer_reviews.author: Joli

customer_reviews.title: Instructions Please!
customer_reviews.text: I love the products but would love it more if there were institutions. I have to research how to use this stuff
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Rysewyk

customer_reviews.title: Great kit and good deal!
customer_reviews.text: There is a lot of great pieces in this kit and good quality for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Soamigo

customer_reviews.title: Nice set.
customer_reviews.text: Love this set, everything is nice, I only wish it didn't come only with Christmas stickers, other than that it comes with all I need to start my nails at home.
customer_reviews.author: ROSANNA MUNOZ

customer_reviews.title: Need better packaging for the powders
customer_reviews.text: My powder spilled out everywhere but everything else is fine smaller than I thought but I like them

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! Brushes are so easy to use and a size for everything
customer_reviews.author: allyson

customer_reviews.title: Must have nails starter kit
customer_reviews.text: This pack is literally everything I need to complete everything, I love it
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Nail art kit
customer_reviews.text: Havent had a chance to fully do my nails but i did play around and the brushes are amazing. I'm still new to designs and such but they definitely make it easy. The only thing id suggest is to have an imsert that explains what each tool is and what to use it for. Other than that id definitely recommend this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Working Nail Art
customer_reviews.text: I really love this company. They never fails me. The gems are nice and sparkly. I have gotten a lot of compliments. I didn’t try the christmas decals yet only because I don’t know how to use em yet. Other than that everything was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Porsha Fayne

customer_reviews.title: Love it. You get everything it says!
customer_reviews.text: I've had so much fun try some of the products in this kit and I can't wait to try the paintbrushes that came in it.. The only down side is I still have to get some rihnstone glue, but I am definitely satisfied and will order a few more as gifts for friends that do home manicures.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I love this whole ensemble. I love the brushes they are a very good quality and they give a nice Variety of Other nail tools and decorations. I Will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Daisha

customer_reviews.title: Everything you’ll need for nail art
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this kit has everything you will need to create artfully beautiful nails! From brushes, to decals, tools and even little gold charms and rhinestones! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Julieanna Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Missing supplies
customer_reviews.text: My Oder was missing About four brushes tht was in the picture and they where the most important ones I am sooooo sad
customer_reviews.author: Nekka

customer_reviews.title: Great little nail art kit
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit! It comes with so many different ways to do nail art. It also came with a pair of scissors and tweezers. Will add photos later.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Nivens

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the girls and I.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t wait for all the things we can do with this kit.

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price, Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: A great kit with everything you need for great designs!!!
customer_reviews.author: LATONYA SEABERRY

customer_reviews.title: I would give this nail kit 100 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.text: I really loved the little zipper pouch everything came in. I love how everything came in it's separate little container and plastic sleeve. Now I'll be able to do my own nails instead of getting them professionally done. It will definitely save me money.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley N Revell

customer_reviews.title: Wanted specialty brushes for my ceramic painting os smalls.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I wanted them for. Just as advertised. Arrived quickly and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: starhealer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself. I love doing my nails so this is perfect for me. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Love the jewels and add on charms for nails! Definitely need to be secured by LED/UV gel polish. Good tools for nail art!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love the foils provided in this kit! The fine detail brushes are easy to clean, and don’t pick up too much product to ensure clean, neat lines. The sponges in this kit are much much better than the sponges I’ve purchased online. 10/10!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: I like
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all, socially for the price! It has all your basics
customer_reviews.author: ociel martinez

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a gift. Came quick. Nicely packaged. Lots of stuff for small price. Very happy. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth booth

customer_reviews.title: Love this Christmas nail kit
customer_reviews.text: Received my nail art kit just in time for Christmas so it was part of my daughter's Christmas presents and she loves it and so do i we got to do her nails tonight with the merry Christmas nail tattoos and they are actually really easy to use for it being my first time using them and they are so cute. Love this kit
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good kit
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about this kit except for the brushes. All of the handles were delivered with scratches, and the brushes also had a strong chemical smell to them.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Beristain

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Set!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything is perfect! The brushes are nice! Great embellishments! I love the stripping tape!! It was my first time using striping tape and I find these amazing. Shipping was quick.
customer_reviews.author: Porsha Fayne

customer_reviews.title: Nail Tech Student says NOT APPROVED
customer_reviews.text: They didn’t last long at all — i love the silicone tools but that’s the only upside besides the nail accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Malave

customer_reviews.title: No instructions or glue
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with any directions. I do my nails often and this kit would have to take a professional (and they probably can’t figure it out). Returning
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: I like every product that I have tried so far!! I do my own gel nails and I highly reccomend this kit!! Makes doing your own nails so easy!! I have bought so many different tools and these by far are the best!! I would buy them again!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Thought it’d at least bring an acrylic brush as well but it didn’t
customer_reviews.author: Jay

product_meta.title: Nail Art Tools Fashion Design - 8 Size Painting Brushes, 5 Carving/Dotting Pen, 12 Style Decals/Stencils, Striping Tapes, Irregular 3D Rhinestones, Manicure Sponge
feature_bullets: ◎Hot Nail Art Tools on Youtube & Ins - Ladies, nails are an extension of what you wear, and cool nail art always happens to garner a lot of attention and compliments. Besides, who doesn’t love an added dose of glamor to their nails? If you’re bored of your classic, monotone nail color and want to try out something fun and quick, you need this nail art kit to make your nail art simple and quick - Soon you'll be a total PRO!!

◎Paint Your Nails at Home So Easy - Package included 13pc two-heads designed nail painting brushes/pens. Totally 23 heads with different sizes, not only save your space but also helps create any line and intricate detail! Flat nail art brush can be use for long fluid strokes; detailing nail art brush use for intricate work; silicone pen helps flatten decoration or carving gel polish; dotting pens for various dotting work. Triangle cuticle peeler help easily remove your nail polish.

◎Irregular Mixed 3D Nail Art Rhinestones - A whole case of fashionable mixed nail art rhinestones of any shape and dazzle colors, which contains 2018 trend-setting elements. Including simulated transparent diamonds, metal trim rings, loving heart, Christian cross, feathers, shells and so on.

◎Indian, Template & Striping Tapes Decoration - Indian Style Waterslide Decals such as popular Indian patterns, lace, feather, streak and particularly dream net decals. And we take a first try combination of 3 different widths of striping tapes including 9*1mm, 3*2mm and 3*3mm, will help you easily create different patterns nail art. The tape comes in three classic colors golden, silver and black.

◎Useful Tools Provided - Huge DIY sponge for 2 more color fade manicure. It can be used many times just cut off the used part. Scissors helps to cut the sponge & stickers you need, nippers is convenient to take out the Nail Art Rhinestones and stickers.
